O6.summary: Return to Gladys on the Groundbreaker

description.S1: You've acquired one of the company secrets that Gladys was talking about. You can return to her to sell it, or keep searching for more secrets.

blurb.B1: You can complete this quest by giving Gladys all or none of the secrets,
blurb.B2: though if you are going to give her one the best one to do is the toothpaste because it will cause you to complete The Doom That Came to Roseway.
blurb.B3: Whereas, either of the other two will Botch their Quests and you will gain no XP, only Bit Cartridges

dialog.speaker: GladysCulkelly (Female)
dialog.utterance: Have you had a moment to look into that little 'opportunity' I told you about on Roseway?

dialog.speaker: GladysCulkelly (Female)
dialog.utterance: You don't hurry up, someone'll get to snoopin' around there before you do.

dialog.speaker: GladysCulkelly (Female)
dialog.utterance: You here for a particular reason? Or did the neighbors tell you how good my sugar cookies are? Made without a single natural ingredient or an oven, just like store-bought.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I investigated that distress signal from Roseway.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: About those secrets you asked me to look for...

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That excursion you sent me on was no cakewalk, lady.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I found this fancy toothpaste formula. Here you go.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I found a formula for experimental rocket fuel. Seems like pretty advanced stuff.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I acquired some research on raptidon musk. Interested?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I found schematics for a prototype weapon from FORCE, and I'm selling. You buying?

dialog.speaker: GladysCulkelly (Female)
dialog.utterance: These corporations, I tell you - once they get an idea into their big, dense heads, there's no gettin' it out again.

dialog.speaker: GladysCulkelly (Female)
dialog.utterance: Can't imagine how I'll offload this, but waste not, want not, I suppose.

dialog.speaker: GladysCulkelly (Female)
dialog.utterance: My stars, what a find. Fine picking like this deserves an equally fine payout. Go on, dearie - and don't spend it all in one place!

dialog.speaker: GladysCulkelly (Female)
dialog.utterance: Pardon me, sweetheart - my old ears must've misheard you. Did you say 'raptidon'? Gracious, someone must've hauled them off Monarch. Naughty, naughty.

dialog.speaker: GladysCulkelly (Female)
dialog.utterance: A couple of folks around here might pay a fair few bits for this. Might even be able to start a bidding war.

dialog.speaker: GladysCulkelly (Female)
dialog.utterance: Peaches and cream, if that isn't the most handsome bit of lethal engineering I've seen all week. That'll go for a tidy sum of bits.

dialog.speaker: GladysCulkelly (Female)
dialog.utterance: Fair's fair. No one ever said old Gladys was a cheapskate, no sir, and I'm not about to let them start. Here - consider it hazard pay.
